means: 安道尔共和国（位于欧洲），安道尔市

sentence.Network_en: Go up to Ramsgate, cross into France, go through Andorra and into Spain.
sentence.Network_cn: 北行至拉姆斯盖特，然后横跨法国，穿过安多拉，进入西班牙。

sentence.Network_en: Steve McClaren's side struggled in the first half against Andorra.
sentence.Network_cn: 麦克拉伦的队员们在对阵安道尔的上半场比赛中非常努力.

sentence.Network_en: England play minnows Andorra on Saturday and Macedonia on Wednesday 6 September.
sentence.Network_cn: 英格兰队将在本周六和下周三分别迎战安道尔和马其顿.

means.word_mean: 1. a small republic in the eastern Pyrenees between Spain and France

auth_sentence.content: Armenia kept their slim hopes of qualification alive with a 3-0 win over Andorra.
